description: R and Fortran code for AMA and ADMM splitting methods for convex clustering
README.md:
ConvexCluster ============= R and Fortran code for AMA and ADMM splitting methods for convex clustering. Remarks ======= The Fortran code currently employs Intel's MKL for some matrix linear algebra. This is not essential for correctness. Alternatives will be provided in the future. This is accompanying code for a manuscript entitled 'Splitting Methods for Convex Clustering' (http://arxiv.org/abs/1304.0499). Legal Stuff ===========
Splitting Methods for Convex Clustering by Eric C. Chi is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.
